greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Involution of nonnegative integers: Keep the least significant quaternary digit q0 of n fixed, but swap the positions of digits q1 <-> q2, q3 <-> q4, ..., etc. in the base-4 expansion of n (where n = ... + q4*256 + q3*64 + q2*16 + q1*4 + q0)
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = (n mod 4) + 4*A126006([n/4]), where brackets stand for the floor function.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 02 2007
